network_element_types.Name: BTS
network_element_types.Description: Base Transceiver Station: A base station responsible for radio communication with the mobile station.

network_element_types.Name: BSC
network_element_types.Description: Base Station Controller: Manages multiple BTS units, responsible for call setup and handovers.

network_element_types.Name: MSC
network_element_types.Description: Mobile Switching Center: Routes calls and manages connections in the mobile network.

network_element_types.Name: HLR
network_element_types.Description: Home Location Register: A central database that stores subscriber information and location.

network_element_types.Name: VLR
network_element_types.Description: Visitor Location Register: A temporary database that stores subscriber information for a specific location.

network_element_types.Name: AUC
network_element_types.Description: Authentication Center: Responsible for verifying subscriber identities.

network_element_types.Name: SMSC
network_element_types.Description: Short Message Service Center: Handles SMS delivery between users.

network_element_types.Name: GMSC
network_element_types.Description: Gateway MSC: Routes calls between mobile and other networks like PSTN.

network_element_types.Name: NodeB
network_element_types.Description: NodeB: The 3G base station responsible for radio communication.

network_element_types.Name: RNC
network_element_types.Description: Radio Network Controller: Manages NodeBs and controls radio access.

network_element_types.Name: MSC
network_element_types.Description: Mobile Switching Center: Routes calls and manages connections in the mobile network.

network_element_types.Name: SGSN
network_element_types.Description: Serving GPRS Support Node: Responsible for packet-switched data routing.

network_element_types.Name: GGSN
network_element_types.Description: Gateway GPRS Support Node: The node that connects the GPRS network to external data networks.

network_element_types.Name: HLR
network_element_types.Description: Home Location Register: Stores subscriber information.

network_element_types.Name: VLR
network_element_types.Description: Visitor Location Register: Temporarily stores subscriber data when they roam.

network_element_types.Name: CGF
network_element_types.Description: Charging Gateway Function: Handles billing and charging for network usage.

network_element_types.Name: SMSC
network_element_types.Description: Short Message Service Center: Manages SMS delivery.

network_element_types.Name: PCRF
network_element_types.Description: Policy and Charging Rules Function: Determines user policies and charging.

network_element_types.Name: IMS
network_element_types.Description: The IMS (IP Multimedia Subsystem) is a core network element in modern mobile networks.

network_element_types.Name: eNodeB
network_element_types.Description: Evolved NodeB: The base station in 4G LTE, responsible for radio access.

network_element_types.Name: EPC
network_element_types.Description: Evolved Packet Core: The core network architecture for 4G LTE, handling both data and voice services.

network_element_types.Name: SGW
network_element_types.Description: Serving Gateway: Routes data from the eNodeB to the external network.

network_element_types.Name: PGW
network_element_types.Description: PDN Gateway: Provides connectivity between the LTE network and external IP networks.

network_element_types.Name: MME
network_element_types.Description: Mobility Management Entity: Manages mobility and session control for 4G networks.

network_element_types.Name: HSS
network_element_types.Description: Home Subscriber Server: Stores user profile and authentication data.

network_element_types.Name: PCRF
network_element_types.Description: Policy and Charging Rules Function: Manages quality of service and charging policies.

network_element_types.Name: SMSC
network_element_types.Description: Short Message Service Center: Manages SMS delivery.

network_element_types.Name: VoLTE Gateway
network_element_types.Description: Voice over LTE Gateway: Facilitates voice communication over the LTE network.

network_element_types.Name: IMS
network_element_types.Description: The IMS (IP Multimedia Subsystem) is a core network element in modern mobile networks.

network_element_types.Name: gNodeB
network_element_types.Description: gNodeB: The 5G base station responsible for providing radio access.

network_element_types.Name: AMF
network_element_types.Description: Access and Mobility Management Function: Handles the registration, mobility, and security of users in 5G.

network_element_types.Name: SMF
network_element_types.Description: Session Management Function: Manages the session state in 5G networks.

network_element_types.Name: UPF
network_element_types.Description: User Plane Function: Handles data packet forwarding and routing in 5G.

network_element_types.Name: PCF
network_element_types.Description: Policy Control Function: Manages quality of service and charging policies in 5G networks.

network_element_types.Name: UDM
network_element_types.Description: Unified Data Management: Stores subscription data for users.

network_element_types.Name: NRF
network_element_types.Description: Network Repository Function: Maintains a repository of available network functions and their capabilities.

network_element_types.Name: NSSF
network_element_types.Description: Network Slice Selection Function: Assigns network slices to users based on their subscription and needs.

network_element_types.Name: AUSF
network_element_types.Description: Authentication Server Function: Performs user authentication in 5G networks.

network_element_types.Name: IMS
network_element_types.Description: The IMS (IP Multimedia Subsystem) is a core network element in modern mobile networks, including 5G.

network_element_types.Name: NEF
network_element_types.Description: Network Exposure Function: Provides secure and standardized APIs for external applications to access 5G network functions.

network_element_types.Name: AF
network_element_types.Description: Application Function: Interfaces with the 5G core to provide application-specific services.
